amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to revise the DoD Food Service Program Manual (Number 1338.10 and dated December 2, 2014) to exclude meat.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 75 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit DOD from excluding meat from their Food Service Program Manual.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Smith (NE).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
